subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Brett Favre, who 11 months ago retired from the N.F.L. in a tear-filled news conference only to return for another season, has told his agent to tell the Jets he is retiring again after 18 seasons.
snippet: Brett Favre, who 11 months ago retired from the N.F.L. in a tear-filled news conference only to return for another season, has told his agent to tell the Jets he is retiring again after 18 seasons.
